prompts:
/thoughtbox:interleaved-thinking (MCP) task="Please engage in a highly extensive (i.e. between 100-500 thoughts) exploration of the "search space" surrounding how we could implement observability for the human user. \
\
One example that I've considered for how we accomplish what I want to accomplish is that we build a WebSockets server that serves real-time updates of a visualization of the agent's reasoning, as represented in the doubly-linked list created as the agent calls the thoughtbox tool on this server.

I would like you to create a new subfolder inside the specs folder at the root of the project, and within that create a series of markdown specifications describing the vision that you are articulating and hinting at here in your response to me.

Use mediums that are not just the written word. So diagrams—I don't suspect that math is going to be super appropriate—but math if it applies. Favor truth-seeking mediums of communication over language. Not too heavy, still make it readable to me, but you get what I'm getting at.
